backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing HTTP outcall functions to fetch Quran surahs, prayer times by city/country, and Islamic calendar data from external APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features: Quran navigation, Islamic calendar, prayer times, and Islamic-themed UI design with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 14 frontend files covering routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling for the Islamic Companion application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with OKLCH color values for the Islamic design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the Islamic Companion React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining root layout and four routes (home, Quran, calendar, prayer times) with Layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/FestivalCard.tsx: Card component displaying Islamic festival details including name, Gregorian/Hijri dates, and optional description with Islamic-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Shared layout component with sticky header navigation, crescent moon logo, responsive nav buttons, Islamic pattern background, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LocationSelector: Form component with city and country inputs allowing users to submit location for fetching prayer times.
frontend/src/components/PrayerTimeDispla: Displays five daily prayer times with current prayer highlighting, Hijri date, and location information in an elegant card layout.
frontend/src/components/SurahContent.tsx: Displays a Quran surah with Arabic text and translations, including navigation buttons to move between surahs and a scrollable list of verses with verse numbers.
frontend/src/components/SurahList.tsx: Renders a scrollable sidebar list of all 114 Quran surahs with their Arabic and English names, verse counts, and selection highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality with AuthClient integration and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching Quran surahs, prayer times, and Islamic calendar data from the backend actor, with holiday description mapping.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Islamic-themed color palette (gold, emerald, teal) and dark mode support, plus Arabic font styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Displays Islamic calendar festivals and important dates with year selection dropdown, loading states, and grid layout of festival cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component displaying three main feature cards (Quran, Prayer Times, Islamic Calendar) with navigation links, icons, and descriptions using TanStack Router and Lucide icons.
frontend/src/pages/PrayerTimesPage.tsx: Prayer times page that uses location selection to fetch and display daily prayer times for five obligatory prayers, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/QuranPage.tsx: Quran reading page with a two-column layout: surah list sidebar for navigation and main content area displaying selected surah text with loading/error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme (including Islamic-themed colors like gold, emerald, teal), typography, animations, and design tokens using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Islamic Companion app's features (Quran text, festival calendar, prayer times), architectural state, and design requirements including Islamic-themed visual aesthetics.
